title: Alcohol: how much is too much
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Alcohol - Physiological effect
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Drug abuse - Social aspects
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health education
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Alcohol - Juvenile films
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Drug abuse - Alcohol
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Drug abuse - Social aspects
description: An open-minded film which discusses social and physiological effects of alcohol. It is particularly designed for elementary grades. The film considers alcohol through such facts as its abuse as a drug, and its physiological effects on the brain and other parts of the human body. Suitable for upper primary and secondary levels.
